titleStmt.title: Gustave Reese (born New York, Nov 29, 1899; died Berkeley, CA, Sept 7, 1977)

body.head: Gustave Reese (born New York, Nov 29, 1899; died Berkeley, CA, Sept 7, 1977)

div.p: Gustave Reese (born New York, Nov 29, 1899; died Berkeley, CA, Sept 7, 1977), American musicologist, specialist in Renaissance music, who taught at several distinguished universities and also as the Juilliard School of Music, New York. He was associate editor (1933-44) then editor (1944-45) of The Musical Quarterly.
There is no known correspondence between Schenker and Reese, indeed probably no contact of any sort.
